list_definition.definition: (a) feeling of great worry or anxiety caused by the knowledge of danger

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soldier tried not to show his fear
She has a deep-seated fear of spiders.
She feared her father when he was angry
I fear for my father’s safety (= I am worried because I think he is in danger).
I fear you will not be able to see him today.
